title: My new Orianna skin concept!
body:
As some of you no doubt know, I created a skin for Orianna a few weeks back that received lots of attention from the community! If any of you missed it, here's a link the my original Orianna skin, inspired by pop culture!

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ErVsKoVy-my-orianna-skin-concept

It hasn't been confirmed whether Rito is going to add it to the game or not, but based on what I've heard prospects are pretty good! But I didn't want to stop there, not for my favourite champion. I had to create another one! This one took me even longer, but it was well worth it. It's called "Oriana Grande" Hope you like it!

replies.body: OMG dem photoshop skillz are superb. Nice Job 10/10 would actually buy in the shop.
I laughed when I saw this. XD
I live to make crazi girls laugh. Life is complete.
Kids, this is how you were made... XD
Dis is the best thing ever ori looks HOT!!!
LOLOL. I've been wanting to change my IGN to Orianna Grande for agesssssssssss.
Sings: She just gives me problems.
Thanks, but photoshop is a little basic for me. I'm a professional. I created this bad boy in MS Paint.
Can't believe this isn't already a thing.
Orianna Grande confirmed, new legendary skin approaching!!!! {{champion:61}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3070}}
If you are sick then take some Medicine!{{item:2041}}
